companies.name: Defang
companies.description: Defang is a cybersecurity company specializing in threat intelligence and network protection.
companies.info: Founded in 2018, Defang has quickly become a leader in AI-driven security solutions.

companies.name: Trulioo
companies.description: Trulioo is a global identity verification company providing real-time verification in over 195 countries.
companies.info: Established in 2011, Trulioo has offices in Vancouver, San Francisco, and Dublin.

companies.name: Scalar
companies.description: Scalar is a cloud infrastructure company offering scalable solutions for businesses of all sizes.
companies.info: Scalar was founded in 2015 and has seen rapid growth in the cloud computing sector.

companies.name: Transoft Solutions
companies.description: Transoft Solutions develops advanced software for the transportation engineering industry.
companies.info: With over 30 years in business, Transoft Solutions serves clients in over 150 countries.

companies.name: Incogni
companies.description: Incogni is a privacy protection service that automates personal data removal from the internet.
companies.info: Launched in 2020, Incogni is a subsidiary of Surfshark, a well-known VPN provider.

companies.name: Red Bull
companies.description: Red Bull is an energy drink company known for its marketing and involvement in extreme sports and eSports.
companies.info: Founded in 1987 in Austria, Red Bull has sold over 100 billion cans worldwide.
